DOC.brief_summary: The investigator perform study evaluate efficacy regular ingestion white fish reduce cardiovascular risk factor patient metabolic syndrome , compare diet fish seafood .
DOC.brief_title: White Fish Cardiovascular Risk Factors Patients With Metabolic Syndrome : WISH-CARE Study
DOC.detailed_description: This study design randomize cross-over multicenter clinical trial participate center CIBER de Fisiopatología de la Obesidad Nutrición ( CIBERobn ) , coordinate Hospital Universitario Ramón Cajal , Madrid . The investigator include adult patient metabolic syndrome defined Third Report National Cholesterol Education Program , Adult Treatment Panel III . All subject Caucasian European ancestry . Patients randomize screen visit one two sequence : 1 ) Sequence 1 receive fish consumption first fish . The individual randomize arm continue previous alimentary habit , avoid significant nutritional imbalance , ingestion 7 serf hake ( serve consist 100g frozen Namibia hake , Pescanova S.A. , Pontevedra , Spain ) per week period 8 week . Afterwards continue another 8 week diet except avoidance fish seafood ; 2 ) Sequence 2 start previous alimentary habit , avoid significant nutritional imbalance , well fish seafood first 8 week . Afterwards change diet 7 serf hake per week .
DOC.criteria: We include adult patient metabolic syndrome defined Third Report National Cholesterol Education Program , Adult Treatment Panel III . Fish allergy positive antibody Anisakis spp . Morbid obesity BMI ≥40kg/m2 . Chronic renal failure . Chronic psychopathy . Neoplasia . Refusal participate study .
